{"id":504883175,"lang":"cpp","time":"9 months, 1 week","timestamp":1623150845,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"32 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/504883175/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        if(!s.length()) return 0;\n        unordered_map<char,int>mp;\n        mp[s[0]]=0;\n        int b=0,mx=1,i;\n        for( i=1;i<s.size();i++){\n            if(mp.count(s[i])){\n                mx=max(i-b,mx);\n                b=max(b,mp[s[i]]+1);\n                mp[s[i]]=i;\n            }\n            else mp[s[i]]=i;\n        }\n        return max(i-b,mx);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
